text:
👏🏼WOW. Listen to @USNavy Captain Brett #Crozier’s send off GIVEN BY HIS CREW. Crozier was relieved of command for trying to save their lives.

American hero.🇺🇸

#coronavirus #COVID19 #CoronavirusPandemic
